sen.j: マキノ 正幸（まきの まさゆき、1940年 -）は、日本の経営者。
sen.e: Masayuki MAKINO (1940 -) is a Japanese businessperson.
Masayuki MAKINO (1940 -) is a Japanese businessperson.
Masayuki MAKINO (1940 -) is a Japanese businessperson.

sen.j: 沖縄アクターズスクール校長。
sen.e: He is the head of Okinawa Actors School Co., Ltd.
He is the head of Okinawa Actors School Co., Ltd.
He is the head of Okinawa Actors School Co., Ltd.

sen.j: 日本サーフボール協会代表。
sen.e: He is the representative of Japan Surfball Association.
He is the representative of Japan Surfball Association.
He is the representative of Japan Surfball Association.

sen.j: ドリームプラネット・インターナショナル・スクールオーナー。
sen.e: He is the owner of Dream Planet International School.
He is the owner of Dream Planet International School.
He is the owner of Dream Planet International School.
He was from Kyoto prefecture.
He is from Kyoto prefecture.
He is from Kyoto prefecture.
Biography and Personal Profile
Biography and Personal Profile
Biography and Personal Profile

sen.j: 祖父は日本映画の父である牧野省三。
sen.e: His grandfather was Shozo MAKINO, the father of Japanese film.
His grandfather was Shozo MAKINO, the father of Japanese film.
His grandfather was Shozo MAKINO, the father of Japanese film.

sen.j: 父は映画監督であるマキノ雅弘。
sen.e: His father was Masahiro MAKINO, film director.
His father was Masahiro MAKINO, film director.
His father was Masahiro MAKINO, film director.

sen.j: 母は宝塚歌劇団卒業生で映画女優の轟夕起子。
sen.e: His mother was Yukiko TODOROKI, former member of Takarazuka Kagekidan (Takarazuka Revue Company), movie actress.
His mother was Yukiko TODOROKI, former member of Takarazuka Kagekidan (Takarazuka Revue Company), movie actress.
His mother was Yukiko TODOROKI, former member of Takarazuka Kagekidan (Takarazuka Revue Company), movie actress.

sen.j: 異母兄妹マキノ佐代子。
sen.e: His younger paternal half-sister is Sayoko MAKINO.
His younger paternal half-sister is Sayoko MAKINO.
His younger paternal half-sister is Sayoko MAKINO.

sen.j: 娘は牧野アンナ（元スーパーモンキーズ）。
sen.e: His daughter is Anna MAKINO (former member of Super Monkeys).
His daughter is Anna MAKINO (former member of Super Monkeys).
His daughter is Anna MAKINO (former member of Super Monkeys).

sen.j: 長門裕之・津川雅彦兄弟の口から語られることはないが、紛れもなく彼らの親族。
sen.e: He is without doubt a relative of Hiroyuki NAGATO and his younger brother Masahiko TSUGAWA though they don't tell that from their own lips.
He is without doubt a relative of Hiroyuki NAGATO and his younger brother Masahiko TSUGAWA though they don't tell that from their own lips.
He is without doubt a relative of Hiroyuki NAGATO and his younger brother Masahiko TSUGAWA though they don't tell that from their own lips.

sen.j: 本州を飛び出し、沖縄で沖縄アクターズスクールを設立。
sen.e: He left Honshu (the main island of Japan) and founded Okinawa Actors School Co., Ltd. in Okinawa.
He left Honshu (the main island of Japan) and founded Okinawa Actors School Co., Ltd. in Okinawa.
He left Honshu (the main island of Japan) and founded Okinawa Actors School Co., Ltd. in Okinawa.

sen.j: 初期には娘のアンナ、早坂好恵、里中茶美（『DA PUMP』ISSAの姉）を本州へアイドルとして送り出している。
sen.e: In the early days of the school, he sent his daughter Anna, Yoshie HAYASAKA, Chami SATONAKA (older sister of ISSA, a member of "DA PUMP") as teenage star into Honshu.
In the early days of the school, he sent his daughter Anna, Yoshie HAYASAKA, Chami SATONAKA (older sister of ISSA, a member of "DA PUMP") as teenage stars into Honshu.
In the early days of the school, he sent his daughter Anna, Yoshie HAYASAKA, Chami SATONAKA (older sister of ISSA, a member of "DA PUMP") as teenage stars into Honshu.

sen.j: スーパーモンキーズ、SPEED、知念里奈の活躍で、一躍芸能人養成プロダクション経営者として脚光を浴びる。
sen.e: Thanks to the performance of Super Monkeys, SPEED, Rina CHINEN, he entered the limelight as manager of a production for the training of entertainers.
Thanks to the performance of Super Monkeys, SPEED, Rina CHINEN, he entered the limelight as the manager of a production for the training of entertainers.
Thanks to the performance of Super Monkeys, SPEED, Rina CHINEN, he entered the limelight as the manager of a production for the training of entertainers.

sen.j: 後にスーパーモンキーズのリードボーカルとしてデビューする安室奈美恵の才能をいち早く見出したことでも有名。
sen.e: He was also famous for quickly discovering the talent of Namie AMURO who would make her debut later as lead vocal of Super Monkeys.
He was also famous for quickly discovering the talent of Namie AMURO who made her debut later as the lead vocal of Super Monkeys.
He was also famous for quickly discovering the talent of Namie AMURO who made her debut later as the lead vocal of Super Monkeys.

sen.j: 友人に誘われてスクール見学に来ていた当時小学生の安室を熱心にスカウトし、困惑する安室の母に「授業料は要らない」と、異例の特待生待遇で入学させている。
sen.e: He eagerly tried to recruit AMURO, who was at that time a elementary school student coming to visit the school at the invitation of her friend and he admitted her into the school as scholarship student that was un unusual treatment, saying 'no need to pay her tuition fee' to her confused mother.
